hero.description: Capturing your pre-wedding moments in the enchanting landscapes of Chiang Mai, Thailand. We create memories that resonate with beauty, just like a songbird's melody.

about.label: About Mavis Studio
about.title: Memorial Creators
about.paragraph1: Founded by Nonthawat Pinchai and Benyapa Varalert, Mavis Studio brings a fresh perspective to pre-wedding photography in Chiang Mai, Thailand. We specialize in serving international couples from China and Singapore who dream of capturing their love story against Thailand's stunning landscapes.
about.paragraph2: Just as a songbird sings not because it has an answer but because it has a song, we create not just because we can, but because we have a vision. Every moment is decorated with beautiful details, every step in your journey crafted with care.

We specialize in serving international couples from China and Singapore who dream of capturing their love story against Thailand's stunning landscapes.
story.paragraph2: Just as a songbird sings not because it has an answer but because it has a song, we create not just because we can, but because we have a vision. Every moment is decorated with beautiful details, every step in your journey crafted with care.
